alfredsnippet.snippet:
"Fundamental physics, as understood nowadays, cannot continue to enjoy its eminence without discounting Life as a by-product on top of the material processes. The anticipated final theory in physics has nothing to contribute to the organization of biological systems. Trying to unify physics first and then seeking an explanation of Life looks like an attempt to 'cross a chasm in two small jumps.'"

- Simon Berkovich, Ultimate irreversibility in the Universe: continuous holographic recording of every event and biological memory as a part of it
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Biology is Consistently Ignored When People Create Theories of Everything - Part 2
